com.bomberman.screens

Class MainGameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bomberman.screens.MainGameScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, CollisionObserver

    public class MainGameScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, CollisionObserver
    Główny ekran gry.
